verses.verse: מִכְתָּ֥ם <WH4387> mich-Tam Michtam לְדָוִ֑ד <WH1732> le-da-Vid; of David שָֽׁמְרֵ֥נִי <WH8104> sha-me-Re-ni Preserve אֵ֝֗ל <WH410> 'El, me O God כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for חָסִ֥יתִי <WH2620> cha-Si-ti for in thee do I put my trust בָֽךְ׃ Vach.

אָמַ֣רְתְּ <WH559> 'a-Mart [O my soul] thou hast said לַֽ֭יהוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh unto the LORD אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai Thou [art] my Lord אָ֑תָּה <WH859> 'At-tah; you ט֝וֹבָתִ֗י <WH2896> toa-Ti, my goodness בַּל־ <WH1077> bal- have no עָלֶֽיךָ׃ <WH5921> 'a-Lei-cha. besides

לִ֭קְדוֹשִׁים <WH6918> Lik-do-shim [But] to the saints אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- who בָּאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> ba-'A-retz [are] in the earth הֵ֑מָּה <WH1992> Hem-mah; that וְ֝אַדִּירֵ֗י <WH117> ve-'ad-di-Rei, and [to] the excellent כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- is all חֶפְצִי־ <WH2656> chef-tzi- in whom [is] all my delight בָֽם׃ Vam.

יִרְבּ֥וּ <WH7235> yir-Bu shall be multiplied עַצְּבוֹתָם֮ <WH6094> atz-tze-vo-Tam Their sorrows אַחֵ֪ר <WH312> 'a-Cher [after] another מָ֫הָ֥רוּ <WH4116> ma-Ha-ru [that] hasten בַּל־ <WH1077> bal- nor אַסִּ֣יךְ <WH5258> 'as-Sich will I not offer נִסְכֵּיהֶ֣ם <WH5262> nis-kei-Hem [god] their drink offerings מִדָּ֑ם <WH1818> mid-Dam; of blood וּֽבַל־ <WH1077> u-val- Nor אֶשָּׂ֥א <WH5375> 'es-Sa take up אֶת־ <WH853> 'e-toSh- שְׁ֝מוֹתָ֗ם <WH8034> mo-Tam, their names עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- upon שְׂפָתָֽי׃ <WH8193> se-fa-Tai. into my lips

יְֽהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh The LORD מְנָת־ <WH4490> me-not- [is] the portion חֶלְקִ֥י <WH2506> chel-Ki of mine inheritance וְכוֹסִ֑י <WH3563> ve-cho-Si; and of my cup אַ֝תָּ֗ה <WH859> 'at-Tah, You תּוֹמִ֥יךְ <WH8551> to-Mich thou maintainest גּוֹרָלִֽי׃ <WH1486> go-ra-Li. my lot

חֲבָלִ֣ים <WH2256> cha-va-Lim The lines נָֽפְלוּ־ <WH5307> na-fe-lu- are fallen לִ֭י li בַּנְּעִמִ֑ים <WH5273> ban-ne-'i-Mim; unto me in pleasant אַף־ <WH637> 'af- Indeed נַ֝חֲלָ֗ת <WH5159> na-cha-Lat, heritage שָֽׁפְרָ֥ה <WH8231> sha-fe-Rah [places] yea I have a goodly עָלָֽי׃ <WH5921> 'a-Lai. and

אֲבָרֵ֗ךְ <WH1288> 'a-va-Rech, I will bless אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who יְעָצָ֑נִי <WH3289> ye-'a-Tza-ni; who hath given me counsel אַף־ <WH637> 'af- Indeed לֵ֝יל֗וֹת <WH3915> lei-Lot, me in the night seasons יִסְּר֥וּנִי <WH3256> yis-se-Ru-ni also instruct כִלְיוֹתָֽי׃ <WH3629> chil-yo-Tai. my reins

שִׁוִּ֬יתִי <WH7737> shiv-Vi-ti I have set יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD לְנֶגְדִּ֣י <WH5048> le-neg-Di before תָמִ֑יד <WH8548> ta-Mid; always כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki Because מִֽ֝ימִינִ֗י <WH3225> mi-mi-Ni, before me because [he is] at my right hand בַּל־ <WH1077> bal- lest אֶמּֽוֹט׃ <WH4131> em-Mot. I shall not be moved

לָכֵ֤ן׀ <WH3651> la-Chen Therefore שָׂמַ֣ח <WH8055> sa-Mach is glad לִ֭בִּי <WH3820> Lib-bi Therefore my heart וַיָּ֣גֶל <WH1523> vai-Ya-gel rejoiceth כְּבוֹדִ֑י <WH3519> ke-vo-Di; and my glory אַף־ <WH637> 'af- also בְּ֝שָׂרִ֗י <WH1320> be-sa-Ri, my flesh יִשְׁכֹּ֥ן <WH7931> yish-Kon also shall rest לָבֶֽטַח׃ <WH983> la-Ve-tach. in hope

כִּ֤י׀ <WH3588> ki for לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- Nor תַעֲזֹ֣ב <WH5800> ta-'a-Zo For thou wilt not leave נַפְשִׁ֣י <WH5315> naf-Shi my soul לִשְׁא֑וֹל <WH7585> lish-'ol; in hell לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- Nor תִתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> tit-Ten neither wilt thou suffer חֲ֝סִידְךָ֗ <WH2623> cha-si-de-cha, thine Holy One לִרְא֥וֹת <WH7200> lir-'ot to see שָֽׁחַת׃ <WH7845> Sha-chat corruption

תּֽוֹדִיעֵנִי֮ <WH3045> to-di-'e-Ni Thou wilt shew אֹ֤רַח <WH734> 'O-rach me the path חַ֫יִּ֥ים <WH2416> chai-Yim of life שֹׂ֣בַע <WH7648> Soa' [is] fulness שְׂ֭מָחוֹת <WH8057> ma-chot of joy אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- פָּנֶ֑יךָ <WH6440> pa-Nei-cha; in thy presence נְעִמ֖וֹת <WH5273> ne-'i-Mot [there are] pleasures בִּימִינְךָ֣ <WH3225> bi-mi-ne-Cha at thy right hand נֶֽצַח׃ <WH5331> Ne-tzach. for evermore
